alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Horry County through 330 PM EDT... At 303 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Forestbrook, or near Red Hill, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Springmaid Pier, Socastee, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Red Hill, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Hand, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Wampee, Forestbrook, Hammond, Coastal Carolina University, Briarcliffe Acres, Atlantic Beach, Lighthouse Care Center Of Conway, Conway Medical Center and Grand Strand Regional Medical Center. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 21. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 18 and 26. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
